name: Greatest Dynasties Mahjong
description:
The greatest dynasties played this game! From emperors to common people honed their minds through this game. And who knows, maybe that was the key to their success?!

There are over 100 mahjong game layouts! Take an unforgettable test for your mind. Start with simple and classic ones and end with exquisite themed ones. Play in 6 game locations, each with many not simple levels. Multi-layered puzzles and huge layouts of 200 chips! Challenge yourself!

- Collect gold chips to complete levels and open the next location
- Capture bonus chips and get extra coins and bonuses
- combo multiplier to increase coins
- 6 locations
- 120 levels
- 2 game difficulty modes
